Html: Is there a way to change the weighting between survival and avoidance for the optimizer ? It uses 10 agi spinels all the way, but I prefer more stamina.
You can't do exactly what you want, but you might achieve a similar effect if you set minimum health or minimum survivability requirement.

What Kavan said is correct. Given the situation your character file describes, 10agis really are optimal for overall rating. You can either set a minimum survival rating (advisable anyway), or more accurately define the situation. ie, if you're in Sunwell, make sure to activate the buffs for Sunwell Radiance and Crushless Mob.
